data.title: French Polynesia: the Marquesas Islands
data.meta_description: French Polynesia scenery for MSFS2020: the Marquesas Islands is made up of 12 islands that emerge from the Pacific surrounded by steep cliffs.
data.text:
Run the setup executable. The installer should find the Flight Simulator 2020/Community folder, if not, browse manually for this route as the scenery must be installed in this location.

NOTE: Some antivirus, e.g., avast, can give a false positive to the Setup.exe file. If so, you can exclude the file from your antivirus program or disable it during the download/installation.

UNINSTALLATION:

To uninstall the scenery, go to the Windows Control Panel and search the option in the “Uninstall or change a program” tab, or go to the Community folder and click the “unins00X” executable.
